title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings
author: oeyoews
name: tiddlywiki-settings
text:
{"tiddlers":{"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/readme":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/readme","text":"> WIP

!! TODO

* 支持中英文切换配置界面: 参考 codemirror6 的配置界面
* 可搜索配置关键词: 支持中英文
* 借鉴一些 commandpalette 的写法.
* 支持一键初始化配置(preset, 类似于 vscode 的 setting.json, 可用于多人分享)
* 支持多配置
* 加上一些 tiddlywiki 的隐藏配置
* 支持配置更改 diff,预览"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings/appearance.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings/appearance.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings/appearance.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: library

tiddlywiki-settings settings library

\*/
module.exports={palette:{text:"$:/palette/xxx"},theme:{text:"$:/themes/oeyoews/notebook"},stickyTitles:{type:"boolean",text:"no"},storyWidth:{},sidebarWidth:{},fontSize:{}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"library"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings/info.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings/info.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings/info.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: library

tiddlywiki-settings settings library

\*/
module.exports={title:{type:"input",text:"",caption:{zh:"太微标题",en:"Tiddlywiki title"},description:{zh:"",en:""}},subtitle:{},defaultTiddlers:{},defaultNewTiddlerTitle:{},defaultNewJournalTitleFormat:{},newTiddlerTags:{},defaultNewTiddlersFocus:{},username:{text:""},description:{type:"input",text:"",caption:{zh:"网站描述",en:"Website description"}},animation:{type:"number",text:"200"}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"library"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/settings.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: library

tiddlywiki-settings settings library

\*/
const e=require("./settings/info"),t=require("./settings/appearance");module.exports={...e,...t,camelcase:{type:"boolean",text:"no"},defaultSidebarTab:{type:"select",text:"open"},permalink:{},navigation:{},minSearchLength:{},editorRefreshTime:{type:"number",text:1e3},syncLog:{type:"boolean",text:"no"}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"library"},"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/widget.js":{"title":"$:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/widget.js","text":"/*\
title: $:/plugins/oeyoews/tiddlywiki-settings/widget.js
type: application/javascript
module-type: widget

tiddlywiki-settings widget

\*/
const{widget:e}=require("$:/core/modules/widgets/widget.js");exports["tw-settings"]=class extends e{constructor(e,t){super(e,t)}render(e,t){if(!$tw.browser)return;this.computeAttributes(),this.execute();const s=(0,$tw.utils.domMaker)("div",{text:require("./settings").editorRefreshTime.text});e.insertBefore(s,t),this.domNodes.push(s)}};","type":"application/javascript","module-type":"widget"}}}
